statements: SELECT * FROM shipping_schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, carrier_name, expected_arrival_date FROM shipping_schedules WHERE shipment_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT carrier_name, schedule_id, expected_arrival_date FROM shipping_schedules ORDER BY expected_arrival_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_schedules WHERE schedule_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT carrier_name FROM shipping_schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, carrier_name, expected_arrival_date, shipment_status FROM shipping_schedules WHERE schedule_id > 100 ORDER BY expected_arrival_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_schedules WHERE carrier_name IN ('UPS', 'FedEx') AND shipment_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY schedule_id ASC;
SELECT carrier_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS schedule_count FROM shipping_schedules GROUP BY carrier_name HAVING schedule_count > 5 ORDER BY schedule_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_schedules WHERE shipment_status = 'In Transit' AND expected_arrival_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY expected_arrival_date ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, carrier_name, expected_arrival_date FROM shipping_schedules WHERE carrier_name LIKE '%Express' AND expected_arrival_date < '2022-10-15' ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, destination FROM shipping_schedules WHERE shipment_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM tracking_records WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT schedule_id, status FROM tracking_records ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT destination, shipment_date FROM shipping_schedules WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT shipment_date, destination FROM shipping_schedules;
SELECT * FROM tracking_records WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT schedule_id, shipment_date, destination FROM shipping_schedules WHERE shipment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT destination, status FROM shipping_schedules JOIN tracking_records ON shipping_schedules.schedule_id = tracking_records.schedule_id;
SELECT schedule_id, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM tracking_records GROUP BY schedule_id HAVING num_records > 1;
SELECT * FROM ShippingCompanies;
SELECT company_name, contact_email FROM ShippingCompanies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, contact_phone FROM ShippingCompanies WHERE company_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT * FROM ShippingSchedules ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_location, arrival_location, arrival_time FROM ShippingSchedules WHERE arrival_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM ShippingCompanies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_id, company_name, contact_email FROM ShippingCompanies WHERE company_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_location, arrival_location FROM ShippingSchedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DeliveryStatus WHERE status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY update_time DESC;

SELECT sc.company_name, ds.status, ds.update_time FROM ShippingCompanies sc JOIN ShippingSchedules ss ON sc.company_id = ss.company_id JOIN DeliveryStatus ds ON ss.schedule_id = ds.schedule_id WHERE sc.company_name = 'FedEx';
SELECT * FROM ShippingSchedule;
SELECT shipment_id, destination_address FROM ShippingSchedule ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, current_status FROM ShipmentStatus WHERE update_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT personnel_id, personnel_name FROM DeliveryPersonnel WHERE personnel_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM DeliveryLog WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ShippingSchedule ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, destination_address FROM ShippingSchedule WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.shipment_id, s.destination_address, d.personnel_name FROM ShippingSchedule s JOIN DeliveryPersonnel d ON s.shipment_id = d.personnel_id;
SELECT s.shipment_id, ss.current_status FROM ShippingSchedule s JOIN ShipmentStatus ss ON s.shipment_id = ss.shipment_id WHERE ss.current_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT s.delivery_date, d.personnel_name FROM ShippingSchedule s JOIN DeliveryPersonnel d ON s.delivery_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT * FROM ShippingCompany;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM ShippingCompany ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingRoute WHERE origin_location = 'New York';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_date, arrival_date FROM ShippingSchedule WHERE arrival_date >= '2022-05-15';
SELECT tracking_id, delivery_date, location FROM DeliveryTracking WHERE status_id = 1 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM ShippingCompany;
SELECT route_name, origin_location, destination_location FROM ShippingRoute ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT arrival_date, departure_date FROM ShippingSchedule WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT status_description FROM DeliveryStatus WHERE status_id = 2 OR status_id = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT schedule_id, delivery_date, location FROM DeliveryTracking WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
